Pre-Game Insights: Team India is expected to don the new jersey for the upcoming tours and ICC events, beginning with the men's team wearing it for the first time in the Australia T20I series starting from September 20, 2022.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The jersey is similar to the one that Team India sported during the inaugural edition of the T20 World Cup 2007,
Others: The three stars above the BCCI logo in the jersey represent the three World Cups India have won in 1983, 2007, and 2011.
